data.title: Arno Allan Penzias - American physicist - Signed photo - 2022 - Nobel Prize
data.meta_description: Arno Allan Penzias. Along with Robert Woodrow Wilson, he discovered the cosmic microwave background radiation, which helped establish the Big Bang theory of cosmology. Authentic photo signed in 2022.
